sides.title: Cloaking Device
sides.ability: Action: Spend 1 [Charge] to perform a [Cloak] action. At the start of the Planning Phase, roll 1 attack die. On a [Focus] result, decloak or discard your cloak token.

sides.title: Contraband Cybernetics
sides.ability: Before you activate, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, until the end of the round, you can perform actions and execute red maneuvers, even while stressed. This card's [Charge] cannot be recovered.

sides.title: Deadman's Switch
sides.ability: After you are destroyed, each other ship at range 0-1 suffers 1 [Hit] damage.

sides.title: Feedback Array
sides.ability: Before you engage, you may gain 1 ion token and 1 disarm token. If you do, each ship at range 0 suffers 1 [Hit] damage.

sides.title: Inertial Dampeners
sides.ability: Before you would execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 shield. If you do, execute a white [0 [Stationary]] instead of the maneuver you revealed, then gain 1 stress token.

sides.title: Rigged Cargo Chute
sides.ability: Action: Spend 1 [Charge]. Drop 1 loose cargo using the [1 [Straight]] template.

device.name: Loose Cargo
device.effect: Loose cargo is a debris cloud.

sides.ability: You can perform the [SLAM] action even while stressed. If you do, you suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage unless you expose 1 of your damage cards. After you partially execute a maneuver, you may expose 1 of your damage cards or suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage to perform a [SLAM] action.
sides.title: Coaxium Hyperfuel

sides.ability: During the System Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to drop 1 cargo crate drift in your [Rear Arc] at range 0. It cannot overlap a ship this way.. This card's [Charge] cannot be recovered.
sides.title: Quick-Release Locks

sides.ability: At the end of Setup, you may spend up to 1 [Charge] from each of your equipped Mine upgrades to place the corresponding device in the play area beyond range 2 of any enemy ship, strategic marker, or other device.
sides.title: Saboteur's Map

sides.ability: At the end of Setup, you may choose any number of other friendly, non-huge ships in your deployment area at range 0-1. If you do, place those ships anywhere in the same deployment area.
sides.title: Scanner Baffler

sides.ability: After you acquire a lock on an object or an object acquires a lock on you, if you have 1 active [Charge], lose 1 [Charge] and jam that object, ignoring range restrictions.
sides.title: False Transponder Codes

sides.ability: Before you would gain a non-lock red or orange token, you may spend 1 [Charge] to place it on this card instead. During the System Phase, if there are 1 or more tokens on this card, you must spend 1 [Charge]. If you cannot, remove those tokens and gain matching tokens.
sides.title: Babu Frik

sides.ability: During the System Phase, if you are not stressed, you may spend 1 [Charge] to gain 3 calculate tokens. During the End Phase, if your [Charge] is inactive, for each green token you remove, gain 1 strain token.
sides.title: Overtuned Modulators

sides.ability: Setup: After placing forces, choose an opponent: they assign the Marked for Elimination condition to 1 of their ships. They must assign it to a limited ship, if able. You ignore range restrictions while acquiring locks on the ship with the Marked for Elimination condition.
sides.title: Tracking Fob

sides.ability: This attack can be performed at range 0. Attack: Spend 1 [Charge].
sides.title: Hotshot Tail Blaster
Feedback Emitter
sides.ability: After an object acquires a lock on you, you may spend 1 [Charge] to jam that object, ignoring range restrictions. This upgrade's [Charge] cannot be recovered.
